feed.title: NeoDB Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for NeoDB: 0.11.4.7
entry.content:
• supported deleting user from cli
  • fixed a few issues in api and external site support
  • fixed data integrity issue, a background job to for this fix will be queued during migration
  • @CorrectRoadH made their first contribution in https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/pull/909
  • Thanks @j1g5awi

Full Changelog: https://github.com/neodb-social/neodb/compare/0.11.4.6...0.11.4.7

entry.title: New release for NeoDB:
entry.content:
• updated Italian translation
  • enabled Portuguese in UI language list

entry.title: New release for NeoDB:
entry.content:
• RSS feed for posts now have more readable titles
  • added page for impressum
  • added https://neodb.net/servers.json
  • various fixes

this is a re-release of 0.11.4.9 fixing an API issue and a logging issue.

entry.title: New release for NeoDB:
entry.content:
• add tags and rating distributions to item api
  • minor performance fixes

entry.title: New release for NeoDB:
entry.content:
• add tags and rating distributions to item api
  • minor performance fixes

this re-release fixes an issue prevent googlebooks links from being parsed properly in certain countries.
